description: crowded room of men, all wearing suits and hats; view from above and behind a long table covered in a white cloth with a man with a white beard, speaking into microphones
inscription: verso in purple: Today\'s Jews....... October 1980 (paragraph of text) | verso in purple: Photo.6 (54.2.35/26) a New York rabbi speaking to an all male congregation in a Brooklyn Synagogue during a \"Verbringen\" meeting. | verso in pencil: 1954 / WILLIAMSBURG, NY. USA.

title: A New York Rabbi speaking to an all male congregation in a Brooklyn Synagogue during a "Verbringen" meeting, Willamsburg, NY
